ingredients: 2 pounds sweet white onions (such as Vidalia), halved and thinly sliced (2 large onions)
¾ pound shallots, thinly sliced (8 to 10 small shallots)
¾ teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste
Freshly ground black pepper, to taste
1 large baguette, cut into ½-inch-thick slices
8 ounces Gruyère cheese, thinly sliced or grated
